channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Popup Box
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Popup Box

item.title: CVE-2024-3477|2024-08-01T20:12:07.199Z -- unknown -- popup%20box
item.description: The Popup Box WordPress plugin before 2.2.7 does not have CSRF checks in some bulk actions, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins perform unwanted actions, such as deleting popups via CSRF attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-3477|2024-06-04T17:31:19.701Z -- unknown -- popup%20box
item.description: The Popup Box WordPress plugin before 2.2.7 does not have CSRF checks in some bulk actions, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins perform unwanted actions, such as deleting popups via CSRF attacks

item.title: CVE-2023-6591|2024-06-04T17:17:09.838Z -- unknown -- popup%20box
item.description: The Popup Box WordPress plugin before 20.9.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
